text: I receive repeated threatening emails from an anonymous sender.
supportiveText: Report the emails to the platform and block the sender.
unSupportiveText: Keep the emails and do nothing.

text: My manager frequently makes personal comments about my appearance.
supportiveText: Document the incidents and report to HR.
unSupportiveText: Laugh it off to avoid conflict.

text: My partner insists on knowing my location at all times.
supportiveText: Set boundaries and seek support from a counselor.
unSupportiveText: Let them track me to avoid arguments.

text: I see someone being yelled at aggressively in public.
supportiveText: Step in if safe or call for help.
unSupportiveText: Walk away and assume it's not my business.

text: A friend is being bullied in a group chat.
supportiveText: Speak up and report the bullying.
unSupportiveText: Mute the chat and avoid involvement.

text: A coworker keeps touching my shoulder despite me asking them to stop.
supportiveText: Reiterate your boundary and escalate to HR.
unSupportiveText: Let it go and try to avoid them.

text: My partner threatens self-harm if I leave them.
supportiveText: Reach out to a crisis line or support service.
unSupportiveText: Stay in the relationship out of fear.

text: I overheard someone making sexist jokes in a meeting.
Someone is impersonating me online and posting false content.
supportiveText: Report the impersonation to the platform.
unSupportiveText: Ignore it and hope it stops.

text: My team excludes me from meetings and decision-making.
supportiveText: Raise the issue with your supervisor.
unSupportiveText: Accept the situation and work harder.

text: My partner controls my finances and access to money.
unSupportiveText: Let them manage everything to keep the peace.

text: A stranger looks uncomfortable with someone speaking aggressively to them.
supportiveText: Check in with the person or alert someone nearby.
unSupportiveText: Assume they know each other and stay out of it.

text: My ex is posting private photos of me online.
supportiveText: Report to the platform and contact legal support.

text: A colleague shares offensive memes in our work chat.
supportiveText: Ask them to stop and inform your manager.
unSupportiveText: Delete the messages and move on.

text: My partner yells and throws things during arguments.
supportiveText: Create a safety plan and talk to someone you trust.
